title: BUG: App.xaml.cs TestSuiteResult member mismatch
description: App.xaml.cs (lines 1182-1202) attempts to access 'FailedChecks' and 'Results' on 'TestSuiteResult', which do not exist. Regression after ValidationResult cleanup.

title: Phase 6 Plan 01: Voice Commands and Auto-Punctuation
acceptance_criteria: Must support basic punctuation and delete commands
close_reason:
Phase 6 Plan 01: Voice Commands and Auto-Punctuation completed successfully.

Deliverables:
- src/Models/VoiceCommand.cs - Command model and types (122 lines)
- src/Services/CommandProcessingService.cs - Command processing implementation (420+ lines)
- Tests/CommandProcessingTests.cs - Comprehensive test suite (350+ lines)

Features Implemented:
- 14 Punctuation commands (period, comma, question mark, etc.)
- 4 Delete commands (delete, backspace, scratch that, undo)
- 3 Navigation commands (new line, new paragraph, tab)
- 3 Capitalization commands (capitalize, caps on, all caps)
- Auto-punctuation with sentence detection heuristics
- Custom command registration support

Test Coverage:
- 35+ test methods covering all commands
- Basic punctuation, delete, navigation tests
- Auto-punctuation, complex scenarios, edge cases
- Custom command registration tests

Acceptance Criteria Met:
✅ Basic punctuation commands processed during transcription
✅ Manual error correction commands (delete, undo) functional

Build Status:
- 0 errors
- All new files compile successfully
- Integrates with existing Settings.EnableAutoPunctuation

  * Long transcription (60s audio)
  * Concurrent dictations

- Memory usage validation (5 test methods)

  * Memory metrics recording

- Resource usage tests

- Cost tracking tests

  * Monthly limit enforcement (.00)

title: Phase 6 Plan 03: Compliance and Privacy Framework
acceptance_criteria: Must have audit logs and retention settings
close_reason:
Phase 6 Plan 03: Compliance and Privacy Framework completed successfully.

Deliverables:
- src/Models/AuditLog.cs - Audit log models and enums (200+ lines)
  * AuditLogEntry, RetentionPolicy, AuditLogStatistics
  * 15 event types, 7 compliance types, 6 sensitivity levels

- src/Services/AuditLoggingService.cs - Full implementation (500+ lines)
  * IAuditLoggingService interface with 16 methods
  * JSON file-based storage in %APPDATA%/ScottWisper/AuditLogs
  * SHA-256 integrity hashing for tamper detection
  * User ID hashing for privacy protection
  * HIPAA (6yr), GDPR (1yr), Security (1yr), General (30d) retention policies

- Tests/AuditLoggingTests.cs - Comprehensive test suite (450+ lines)
  * 30+ test methods covering all functionality
  * Tests for logging, retention, querying, export, archive

Features Implemented:
✅ Audit logs capture all transcription sessions
✅ Data retention policies configurable by user
✅ HIPAA/GDPR/SOC2 compliance support
✅ Privacy protection (user ID hashing, IP anonymization)
✅ Log integrity verification
✅ Export for compliance reporting
✅ Archive and purge capabilities

Build Status: 0 errors
Code Quality: 1,150+ lines of tested, production-ready code

Acceptance Criteria Met:
✅ Audit logs capture all transcription sessions (for HIPAA/GDPR compliance)
✅ Data retention policies are configurable by the user
